msContents.summary: Daybook of arrears for payments of a tax, probably the syntaximon. Dated in the eleventh year of an unnamed emperor, in all probability Tiberius. Each entry consists of a name, patronymic and an amount

msItemStruct.note: Written along the fibers; back blank
Four columns: col. I, 30 lines; col. II, 27 lines; col. III, 19 lines; col. IV, 19 lines;
The hand is a small, rapid cursive; the same scribe wrote P.Princ. 1-6 and P. Cornell 21

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: [col. I] Choiach of the 11th year, for the 10th year . . .; 6 Panetbys s. of Penteuchos 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; 13 Psosneus s. of Praxias 24; 14 . . . n] s. of Papontos 4; [l. 5] Peteuchos s. of Herakles 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Panetbys s. of Kephalos 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; . . . s. of Petesouchos .; -eus s. of Nekpheros s. of Peteu(chos); the 15th of the month of Sebastios of the 11th year for the 10th year; [l. 10] . . .; Keras s. of Horausios 24; Psamis s. of Apynchis 20; the 17th Hellen s. of Sambas 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Atomeus s. of Agron 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 15] Tryphon s. of Melan 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Dionysios s. of Petermouthes 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; the 18th Onnophris s. of Onnophris, weaver 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Heliodoros s. of Dioskourides 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Orsenouphis s. of Nekpheros 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 20] Pacheuris s. of Dio-; . . . s. of Papontos .; . . . s. of Psenatymis .; . . . s. of Heras .; . . . s. of Sambas 4; . . . s. of Iason .; -nis s. of De- s. of Ision 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Mysthas s. of Papontos 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Herkales s. of Leukos . . . 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Ischyrion s. of Panetbys .; Kephalon s. of Panetbys . [col. II] Panetbys s. of Petarpsenesis 8; the 19th Hektor s. of Panetbys 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Mystharion s. of Panoueit- 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Peteuchos s. of Panoutis 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 5] the 20th Peteuchos s. of Mysthas, weaver 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Peteus s. of Peteus, weaver 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Peteus, s. of Peteus 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Peteu-, s. of Peteus 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Mysthas s. of Lysiphres 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 10] Psenatymis s. of Mysthas 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Pt-eus s. of Peteuchos 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Herakles s. of Merres 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Peteuchos s. of Panetbys, weaver 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Sambas s. of Thebas 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 15] Panomgeus s. of Panomgeus s. of At- 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; the 22nd Praxias s. of Praxias 8; the 23rd Meron s. of Apeon 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; the 25th Herkales also called Leukos, s. of Herakles 44 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Pnepheros s. of Archedemos .4; [l. 20] . . . s. of Pnepheros .; Anchorimphis . . .; the 26th Kollouthos s. of Psenatymis .; the 27th Herakles s. Mysthas .; Pnepheros s. of Pnepheros, [[swineherd]]; cowherd 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 25] Polemon s. of Polemon, stepson of Alophis 4; Teos . . . 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Sa- . . . [col. III] the 28th Hatres s. of Haryotes 4; Heras also called Pnepheros s. of Apeon 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Herakles s. of Horos s. of Atilon 44 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Psenatymis s. of Psenatymis 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 5] Petsiris s. of Petsiris the yonger s. of Kene- 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; the 29th Dios s. of Kollouthos 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Haronnophris s. of Heras 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Apollonios s. of Haronnophris 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 10] the 30th Herakles s. of Sambas, weaver 12 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; the 31st Herieus s. of . . . .; Month of Tybi of the 11th year for the 10th year; the 14th Panoueibes s. of Anchorimphis 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Hegemon s. of Panetbys 8 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 15] Herakles s. of Herakles, priest 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; the 25th Dia[. . s. of I]sion s. of Neous 32; Papontos s. of Papontos the younger 32 dr.; the 30th Menas s. of Menas .; . . . [col. IV] The month of Mecheir of the 11th year for the 10th year; the 9th . . . 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; Onnophris . . . 4; the 20th Herakles s. of Psen- 12; [l. 5] the 2- P-s s. of Pnepheros .; -s s. of Nekpheros; the 30th Dios . . .; Sambas . . .; [l. 10] Phasis s. of Hatres; Phasis s. of Phasis; Akousilaos s. of Pnepheros; Nemion s. of Zoilos 28; The month of Psamenoth of the 11th year for the 10th year; the 6th Phasis s. of Hatres 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; [l. 15] Phasis s. of Phasis 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; the 26th Pomas s. of Herieus 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.; The 22nd of Pharmouthi for the 10th year; 1/2 ob. 2 chalki, 1 dr. 1 ob.
